meta.description: A toy company manufactures three types of tabletop golf toy, each requiring different manufacturing techniques. The advanced type requires 17 hours of processing and assembly labor, 8 hours of inspection, and a profit of 300 yuan per unit. The intermediate type requires 10 hours of labor, 4 hours of inspection, and a profit of 200 yuan. The basic type requires 2 hours of labor, 2 hours of inspection, and a profit of 100 yuan. There are 1000 hours of processing labor and 500 hours of inspection available. Furthermore, market forecasts indicate that the demand for the advanced type does not exceed 50 units, for the intermediate type does not exceed 80 units, and for the basic type does not exceed 150 units. Determine the company's production plan to maximize profit.

params.name: labor_hours
params.description: Labor hours required per unit for each type

params.name: inspection_hours
params.description: Inspection hours required per unit for each type

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit for each type

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units to produce for each type

objective.name: total_profit
objective.expr: quicksum(profit[t] * x[t] for t in T)

constraints.name: labor_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(labor_hours[t] * x[t] for t in T)

constraints.name: inspection_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(inspection_hours[t] * x[t] for t in T)
